pkgmetadata.longdescription: # bareTypesTypes for [bareASGI](https://github.com/rob-blackbourn/bareASGI)and [bareClient](https://github.com/rob-blackbourn/bareClient)(read the [docs](https://rob-blackbourn.github.io/bareTypes/)).## InstallationThe package can be installed with pip.```bashpip install baretypes```This is a Python 3.7 and later package with no dependencies.
